event.description: Kazuo Matsui singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
With Michael Bourn batting, Kazuo Matsui picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, Kazuo Matsui to 2nd. throwing error by Nick Johnson.
Michael Bourn flies out to center fielder Elijah Dukes. Kazuo Matsui to 3rd.
Lance Berkman doubles (3) on a line drive to center fielder Elijah Dukes. Kazuo Matsui scores.
With Carlos Lee batting, Lance Berkman caught stealing 3rd base, catcher Jesus Flores to third baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Carlos Lee grounds out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to first baseman Nick Johnson.
Miguel Tejada grounds out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to first baseman Nick Johnson.
Hunter Pence walks.
Jeff Keppinger grounds into a double play, shortstop Cristian Guzman to second baseman Anderson Hernandez to first baseman Nick Johnson. Hunter Pence out at 2nd.
J. R. Towles flies out to center fielder Elijah Dukes.
Brian Moehler flies out to center fielder Elijah Dukes.

Kazuo Matsui doubles (3) on a ground ball to left fielder Adam Dunn. Jeff Keppinger scores. R. Towles scores.

Michael Bourn doubles (4) on a line drive to center fielder Elijah Dukes. Kazuo Matsui scores. Michael Bourn out at 3rd, center fielder Elijah Dukes to second baseman Anderson Hernandez to third baseman Ryan Zimmerman.

Kazuo Matsui strikes out swinging.
